name: Portamon
description:
Portamon is a short Pokemon inspired RPG that revolves around getting your trainer license so that you can begin your journey and make your grandfather proud.

Explore the town.
Complete quests.
Battle trainers.
Get your Portamon trainer license.

Music in the game comes from https://incompetech.com owner Kevin MacLeod.

Controls
WASD/Arrow keys
Move
Enter key
Open Menu
Space bar
Interact with NPCs and Objects
Continue dialogue
Option select
